description:
Welcome to Trials® Rising Open Beta!
Be among the first to explore the latest game in the Trials® franchise.   

Make your way through the new global multiplayer mode, compete in challenging tracks all around the world. 

Bonus: play the Open Beta and unlock the Trials Turbo Bike at launch.

Beta content is not the final content.
An internet connection is required.
Nintendo Switch Online membership is necessary to access mutiplayer content.
name: Trials® Rising - Open Beta
